<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="comment">/// getLoopPreheader - If there is a preheader for this loop, return it.  A</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><Highlight kind="comment">/// loop has a preheader if there is only one edge to the header of the loop</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><Highlight kind="comment">/// from outside of the loop and it is legal to hoist instructions into the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="comment">/// predecessor. If this is the case, the block branching to the header of the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><Highlight kind="comment">/// loop is the preheader node.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This method returns null if there is no preheader for the loop.</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Stable LoopInfo Analysis - Build a loop tree using stable iterators so the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><Highlight kind="comment">/// result does / not depend on use list (block predecessor) order.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Discover a subloop with the specified backedges such that: All blocks within</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><Highlight kind="comment">/// this loop are mapped to this loop or a subloop. And all subloops within this</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><Highlight kind="comment">/// loop have their parent loop set to this loop or a subloop.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BlockT, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LoopT&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aed9f16ed8eafe53615ea3fb09fd9e0eb"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aed9f16ed8eafe53615ea3fb09fd9e0eb">discoverAndMapSubloop</a>(LoopT &#42;L, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;BlockT &#42;&gt;</a> Backedges,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><Highlight kind="normal">                                  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfobase">LoopInfoBase&lt;BlockT, LoopT&gt;</a> &#42;LI,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><Highlight kind="normal">                                  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a763915fd0a536cc2d1ebe99595e3eeaf">DomTreeBase&lt;BlockT&gt;</a> &amp;DomTree) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typedef</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/graphtraits">GraphTraits&lt;Inverse&lt;BlockT &#42;&gt;</a>&gt; InvBlockTraits;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumBlocks = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumSubloops = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopbase/#a2896fd505fc6356f4ad5b53bb5001a39"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Perform a backward CFG traversal using a worklist.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::vector&lt;BlockT &#42;&gt; ReverseCFGWorklist(Backedges.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#aab36927882fbfdcbb860d87fd9c30da8">begin</a>(), Backedges.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a7ca5197533a9c1fb8a2bd30587fcec6b">end</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!ReverseCFGWorklist.empty()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopbase/#a297fe1e46e53629f71cc8e9b4f53b8c9"><Highlight kind="normal">    BlockT &#42;PredBB = ReverseCFGWorklist.back();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="470"><Highlight kind="normal">    ReverseCFGWorklist.pop&#95;back();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"><Highlight kind="normal">    LoopT &#42;Subloop = LI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfobase/#ad61bd84d4988c90bf6c5cd62d8e7fb00">getLoopFor</a>(PredBB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Subloop) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!DomTree.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortreebase/#ac38ddc0af660f81616d869aa2efdbd90">isReachableFromEntry</a>(PredBB))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This is an undiscovered block. Map it to the current loop.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopbase/#a5b3fe20235340fb3bbf3ff86ec172d73"><Highlight kind="normal">      LI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfobase/#a97de9fb6fdce68e4e31300fcf0e5a20c">changeLoopFor</a>(PredBB, L);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><Highlight kind="normal">      ++NumBlocks;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (PredBB == L-&gt;getHeader())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Push all block predecessors on the worklist.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><Highlight kind="normal">      ReverseCFGWorklist.insert(ReverseCFGWorklist.end(),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><Highlight kind="normal">                                InvBlockTraits::child&#95;begin(PredBB),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><Highlight kind="normal">                                InvBlockTraits::child&#95;end(PredBB));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This is a discovered block. Find its outermost discovered loop.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><Highlight kind="normal">      Subloop = Subloop-&gt;getOutermostLoop();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If it is already discovered to be a subloop of this loop, continue.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Subloop == L)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Discover a subloop of this loop.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><Highlight kind="normal">      Subloop-&gt;setParentLoop(L);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><Highlight kind="normal">      ++NumSubloops;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><Highlight kind="normal">      NumBlocks += Subloop-&gt;getBlocksVector().capacity();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><Highlight kind="normal">      PredBB = Subloop-&gt;getHeader();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Continue traversal along predecessors that are not loop-back edges from</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// within this subloop tree itself. Note that a predecessor may directly</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// reach another subloop that is not yet discovered to be a subloop of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// this loop, which we must traverse.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Pred : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aadc93e5b694cde77f4a8a3695372b990">inverse&#95;children&lt;BlockT &#42;&gt;</a>(PredBB)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfobase/#ad61bd84d4988c90bf6c5cd62d8e7fb00">getLoopFor</a>(Pred) != Subloop)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><Highlight kind="normal">          ReverseCFGWorklist.push&#95;back(Pred);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ead20caec3b48a1eef164cb4ca81ba2587">L</a>-&gt;getSubLoopsVector().reserve(NumSubloops);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BlockT, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LoopT&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/populateloopsdfs/#a2e730539eeda2ae79f9f308fa42597ce"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/populateloopsdfs/#a2e730539eeda2ae79f9f308fa42597ce">PopulateLoopsDFS&lt;BlockT, LoopT&gt;::traverse</a>(BlockT &#42;EntryBlock) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/populateloopsdfs/#ac3d14bf8a797b33e7100f3dd8b905acf">insertIntoLoop</a>(BB);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Add a single Block to its ancestor loops in PostOrder. If the block is a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><Highlight kind="comment">/// subloop header, add the subloop to its parent in PostOrder, then reverse the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Block and Subloop vectors of the now complete subloop to achieve RPO.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BlockT, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LoopT&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/populateloopsdfs/#ac3d14bf8a797b33e7100f3dd8b905acf"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/populateloopsdfs/#ac3d14bf8a797b33e7100f3dd8b905acf">PopulateLoopsDFS&lt;BlockT, LoopT&gt;::insertIntoLoop</a>(BlockT &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><Highlight kind="normal">  LoopT &#42;Subloop = LI-&gt;getLoopFor(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Subloop &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a> == Subloop-&gt;getHeader()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We reach this point once per subloop after processing all the blocks in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the subloop.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Subloop-&gt;isOutermost())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"><Highlight kind="normal">      Subloop-&gt;getParentLoop()-&gt;getSubLoopsVector().push&#95;back(Subloop);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"><Highlight kind="normal">      LI-&gt;addTopLevelLoop(Subloop);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For convenience, Blocks and Subloops are inserted in postorder. Reverse</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the lists, except for the loop header, which is always at the beginning.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><Highlight kind="normal">    Subloop-&gt;reverseBlock(1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::reverse(Subloop-&gt;getSubLoopsVector().begin(),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"><Highlight kind="normal">                 Subloop-&gt;getSubLoopsVector().end());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><Highlight kind="normal">    Subloop = Subloop-&gt;getParentLoop();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (; Subloop; Subloop = Subloop-&gt;getParentLoop())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><Highlight kind="normal">    Subloop-&gt;addBlockEntry(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Analyze LoopInfo discovers loops during a postorder DominatorTree traversal</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><Highlight kind="comment">/// interleaved with backward CFG traversals within each subloop</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><Highlight kind="comment">/// (discoverAndMapSubloop). The backward traversal skips inner subloops, so</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><Highlight kind="comment">/// this part of the algorithm is linear in the number of CFG edges. Subloop and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Block vectors are then populated during a single forward CFG traversal</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"><Highlight kind="comment">/// (PopulateLoopDFS).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="569"><Highlight kind="comment">/// During the two CFG traversals each block is seen three times:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="570"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 1) Discovered and mapped by a reverse CFG traversal.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 2) Visited during a forward DFS CFG traversal.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 3) Reverse-inserted in the loop in postorder following forward DFS.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The Block vectors are inclusive, so step 3 requires loop-depth number of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><Highlight kind="comment">/// insertions per block.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BlockT, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LoopT&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfobase/#a280d02be3ec3eb6527c1ea944d902775"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfobase/#a280d02be3ec3eb6527c1ea944d902775">LoopInfoBase&lt;BlockT, LoopT&gt;::analyze</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a763915fd0a536cc2d1ebe99595e3eeaf">DomTreeBase&lt;BlockT&gt;</a> &amp;DomTree) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Postorder traversal of the dominator tree.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/domtreenodebase">DomTreeNodeBase&lt;BlockT&gt;</a> &#42;DomRoot = DomTree.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortreebase/#a1dfeebf79b630b7c859bdbfd58a09c03">getRootNode</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DomNode : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a41c4916e8090ce40598db1a8dd2a5d5d">post&#95;order</a>(DomRoot)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><Highlight kind="normal">    BlockT &#42;Header = DomNode-&gt;getBlock();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;BlockT &#42;, 4&gt;</a> Backedges;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check each predecessor of the potential loop header.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Backedge : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aadc93e5b694cde77f4a8a3695372b990">inverse&#95;children&lt;BlockT &#42;&gt;</a>(Header)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If Header dominates predBB, this is a new loop. Collect the backedges.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/domtreenodebase">DomTreeNodeBase&lt;BlockT&gt;</a> &#42;BackedgeNode = DomTree.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortreebase/#ad8295b9b507d1d847cd46856f8255eab">getNode</a>(Backedge);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BackedgeNode &amp;&amp; DomTree.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortreebase/#a5d344fb542e2d57c633f0161e3a6b231">dominates</a>(DomNode, BackedgeNode))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><Highlight kind="normal">        Backedges.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(Backedge);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfobase/#a8a10d542acf3418b2a5bfefb351829c0"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Perform a backward CFG traversal to discover and map blocks in this loop.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Backedges.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad9a3c7bc26b130377bbafc170b5f88a2">empty</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><Highlight kind="normal">      LoopT &#42;L = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfobase/#a5a0ae49bf720341774a25029fd23bf59">AllocateLoop</a>(Header);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aed9f16ed8eafe53615ea3fb09fd9e0eb">discoverAndMapSubloop</a>(L, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;BlockT &#42;&gt;</a>(Backedges), </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, DomTree);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Perform a single forward CFG traversal to populate block and subloop</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// vectors for all loops.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><Highlight kind="normal">  PopulateLoopsDFS&lt;BlockT, LoopT&gt; DFS(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><Highlight kind="normal">  DFS.traverse(DomRoot-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/domtreenodebase/#aab2bf365c9f4b976adc7479576dfd5bb">getBlock</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfobase/#a485097c9e18d87d37388dc46cecd1dc3"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BlockT, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LoopT&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;LoopT &#42;, 4&gt;</a></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfobase/#a8a10d542acf3418b2a5bfefb351829c0"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfobase/#a8a10d542acf3418b2a5bfefb351829c0">LoopInfoBase&lt;BlockT, LoopT&gt;::getLoopsInPreorder</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;LoopT &#42;, 4&gt;</a> PreOrderLoops, PreOrderWorklist;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The outer-most loop actually goes into the result in the same relative</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="609"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// order as we walk it. But LoopInfo stores the top level loops in reverse</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="610"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// program order so for here we reverse it to get forward program order.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="611"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FIXME: If we change the order of LoopInfo we will want to remove the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="612"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// reverse here.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="613"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LoopT &#42;RootL : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6b0ac1fa4f05de76413c5e0ca6334035">reverse</a>(&#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="614"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PreOrderLoopsInRootL = RootL-&gt;getLoopsInPreorder();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="615"><Highlight kind="normal">    PreOrderLoops.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#a7efd1f0c1206d95e4fe01a9b49a57b82">append</a>(PreOrderLoopsInRootL.begin(),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="616"><Highlight kind="normal">                         PreOrderLoopsInRootL.end());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="617"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="618"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="619"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PreOrderLoops;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="620"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="627"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// order as we walk it. LoopInfo stores the top level loops in reverse</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="628"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// program order so we walk in order here.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
